Text: rd curr estDo you still need a revision of the rd current estimate If so should we update it for September actuals Or should we revise the rd ce for the mill revenue deferral to only and report September actuals in the October monthly cash flow forecast Let me know what you need thanks Carolyn Winowitch PGE Accounting

RE rd curr estThanks Tracy The reclass turned out to be mill which is what I adjusted rd ce for Is this the only adjustment you want us to make We have a couple of other large items goodwill FAS maybe at this point we should just include them in the current cash flow forecast Let me know thanks Carolyn Winowitch PGE Accounting Geaccone Tracy Tracy NRONcom AM It is actually million I would need I revised rd CE and also reflect the change in the cash flow forecast I am sorry I did not get back to you sooner on this Tracy Original Message From Carolyn Winowitch mailto Sent Wednesday October AM To Geaccone Tracy Subject rd curr est Do you still need a revision of the rd current estimate If so should we update it for September actuals Or should we revise the rd ce for the mill revenue deferral to only and report September actuals in the October monthly cash flow forecast Let me know what you need thanks Carolyn Winowitch PGE Accounting This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

rd Current Estimate Cc Attached are the files for the PGG rd current estimate Please take a look at the comments and footnotes We are assuming the goodwill transfer to ENA as of and have given them the amortization to include in their forecast Let me know if you have any questions Carolyn Winowitch PGE Accounting

rd quarterJust wanted to follow up on one thing from our conversation on Friday In Sept you need the rd current estimate but are ok with us providing it to you the week of the th rather than the th And this will be the rd current estimate not just the normal cash flow forecast Then in October we are back to the normal cash flow forecast correct Let me know thanks Carolyn Winowitch PGE Accounting

rd current estimateI just wanted to confirm the timing on the third current estimate We are planning to send this the week of the th as early as possible in the week For October we will be sending the normal monthly cash flow forecast Let me know if this is ok with you thanks Carolyn Winowitch PGE Accounting
